Vietnam Airlines is temporarily suspending all Hanoi - Moscow flights from March 25, 2022 until further notice. This is to allow for the clarification of required procedures regarding vehicle insurance and flight operations to Russia.

Vietnam now exempts visas for citizens from Germany, France, Italy, Spain, the U.K., Russia, Japan, South Korea, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland and Belarus. 
These citizens will be able to enter Vietnam for up to 15 days from the date of entry without a visa.
